alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Clermont; Highland; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 12:53PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL MASON, NORTHERN LEWIS, NORTHEASTERN CLERMONT, WESTERN FAYETTE, SOUTHWESTERN ROSS, BROWN, SOUTHEASTERN WARREN, ADAMS, CLINTON, WESTERN PIKE, SOUTHEASTERN GREENE, HIGHLAND AND WESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM EDT... At 1252 PM EDT, showers were located along a line extending from near Morrow to Lewisburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Wilmington, Maysville, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Georgetown, Blanchester, Washington, Mount Orab, West Union, Sabina, Manchester, Peebles, Ripley, Aberdeen, Vanceburg, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna and Jeffersonville. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 33 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Clermont; Highland; Pike; Ross; Scioto
